pr_title: [BEAM-8328] Disable community metrics integration test in 'test' task

timeline.message: [BEAM-8328] Disable community metrics integration test in 'test' task

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest to change this task from test to some other type if possible. Excluding specific class is not scalable, since newly added classes will still be executed.
timeline.author: Ardagan

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure if making it something else than a test is viable - I don't know if I can run tests from some other task type. I can exclude everything except the class we want to be executed though.
replies.author: mwalenia
